main event: A truck driver spotted a bright, round light that traveled along the east and was descending near Oxford, Wisconsin on 20 Feb 1967.
interesting points: The object was a bright, round light that traveled along the east and was descending.
The witness could not see any outline of the object as it was too bright to make out any details.
The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes.
The object appeared to be illuminated, glowing from within, and changing in color from white to orange and then red. When it started to move, it shot straight up and disappeared almost instantly.
